transcript: I've got employees that make million bucks a year plus you can absolutely become filthy wealthy and that's income right and so a lot of businesses that are at 10 million a year the owner might only take a million bucks in income depending on you know margins Etc a lot of employees they see Top Line as income which is just a very employee mindset they're like oh if I make six figures a year I'll make six figures a year it's like Well if you really want to make six figures you gotta probably make 500 Grand a year you know I mean revenue wise at least if you don't want to have just bought yourself another job
